vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.11.2;
son of: Ahaziah (H0274H) and Zibiah (H6645); married to Jehoaddan (H3086);
father of: Amaziah (H0558); also called Jehoash at 2Ki.11.21; 12.1,2,4,6,7,18; 14.13b;
Another name of yo.ash (יוֹאָשׁ "Joash" H3101I)
§ Jehoash = "given by the Lord"
1) son of king Ahaziah and the 8th king of Judah
2) son of king Jehoahaz and the 12th king of the northern kingdom of Israel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ocozías; rey de Judá ; (b) יוֹאָשׁ   hijo de Joacaz; rey de Israel (798-782/81)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約阿施 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "主所給予的"
1) 亞哈謝王的兒子, 猶大國的第八任王
2) 約哈斯王的兒子, 北國以色列的第十二個王
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约阿施 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "主所给予的"
1) 亚哈谢王的儿子, 犹大国的第八任王
2) 约哈斯王的儿子, 北国以色列的第十二个王

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.13.9;
son of: Jehoahaz (H3059);
father of: Jeroboam (H3379H); also called Jehoash at 2Ki.13.10,25; 14.8,9,11,13,15,16,17;
Another name of yo.ash (יוֹאָשׁ "Joash" H3101J)
§ Jehoash = "given by the Lord"
1) son of king Ahaziah and the 8th king of Judah
2) son of king Jehoahaz and the 12th king of the northern kingdom of Israel
